mapper.select: select calendar_idx, member_idx, title, content, rdate, wdate from (select row_number() over(partition by substr(rdate, 1, 8) order by rdate asc) rn, calendar_idx, member_idx, title, content, rdate, wdate from calendar where member_idx=#{member_idx} and substr(rdate, 1, 8)= #{rdate}) where rn between 1 and 5
mapper.insert: INSERT into calendar(calendar_idx, member_idx, title, content, rdate, wdate) VALUES (calendar_seq.nextval, #{member_idx}, #{title}, #{content}, #{rdate}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select calendar_idx, member_idx, title, content, rdate, wdate from calendar where calendar_idx = #{calendar_idx}
